about_the_game:
Ahoy, mateys! Are you ready for sailing, plundering and drinking rum?

Pirate Ship Tiles have the essentials you'll need to construct your own pirate adventure. This set includes both the inside and the outside of a pirate ship, as well as a secret pirate cove - complete with furniture, treasure and authentic pirate details.

Features:
  • A smooth, painterly style like the one you'll find in Casino, Valentine's, Winter Wonderland, Sci Fi, Halloween, Evil Castle, Royal and Dungeon & Volcanoes tile packs.
  • Large and detailed pirate ship, with a deck, mast and sails.
  • Insides of pirate ship, with multiple decks, furnishings, canons and navigational tools.
  • Pirate hidden cove elements, with a cave for hidden treasure, dock, animated boat and more.
